import _toConsumableArray from"/home/matheuslrd/Documentos/Projetos-Pessoais/YourWallet/node_modules/babel-preset-react-app/node_modules/@babel/runtime/helpers/esm/toConsumableArray";import _objectSpread from"/home/matheuslrd/Documentos/Projetos-Pessoais/YourWallet/node_modules/babel-preset-react-app/node_modules/@babel/runtime/helpers/esm/objectSpread2";// Esse reducer será responsável por tratar o todas as informações relacionadas as despesas
import{ADD_EXPENSES,ADD_CURRENCIES,UPDATE_TOTAL_EXPENSES}from'../actions';var INITIAL_STATE={currencies:[],expenses:[],totalExpenses:0};export default function reducerWallet(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:INITIAL_STATE;var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case ADD_EXPENSES:return _objectSpread(_objectSpread({},state),{},{expenses:[].concat(_toConsumableArray(state.expenses),[action.payload])});case ADD_CURRENCIES:return _objectSpread(_objectSpread({},state),{},{currencies:action.payload});case UPDATE_TOTAL_EXPENSES:return _objectSpread(_objectSpread({},state),{},{totalExpenses:action.payload});default:return state;}}
